product_description: Chocolate-based candies are made primarily from cocoa solids, cocoa butter, and sugar. They come in various forms, including bars, truffles, and filled chocolates.
Gummy candies are soft, chewy treats typically made from gelatin, sugar, and flavorings. They come in a variety of shapes, such as bears, worms, and fruit slices.
Hard candies are solid, sugar-based sweets that dissolve slowly in the mouth. They often come in the form of individually wrapped pieces or on a stick.
Chewy candies have a soft and elastic texture that requires a bit of chewing before they dissolve.
